vote.text: Amendment SA 925 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 925 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S4862-4863; text: CR S4862-4863) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 925 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Portman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 925 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
